io.pollend.quartz.annotation

Annotation Type ScheduleOn


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={METHOD,PARAMETER,TYPE})
 @Bindable
public @interface ScheduleOn
    An annotation for scheduling a quartz job.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends org.quartz.Job> value 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String description 
      boolean durability 
      java.lang.String id 
      boolean recoverable 

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends org.quartz.Job> value
        Returns:
        target job for that will be used to schedule the job.

      • id

        public abstract java.lang.String id
        Returns:
        id reference for scheduler.
        Default:
        "default"

      • durability

        public abstract boolean durability
        Returns:
        Set job status for JobDetail.isDurable().
        Default:
        false

      • recoverable

        public abstract boolean recoverable
        Returns:
        Set job status for JobDetail.requestsRecovery().
        Default:
        false

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        Returns:
        Set job status for JobDetail.getDescription().
        Default:
        ""
